unnormalised: Kamgar Mantralay EPF Yojnent Sudharanna Suchoita
normalised: Kamgar Mantralay E-P-F Yojnent Sudharanna Suchoita

unnormalised: Kendriya Kamgar Mantralay Karmachari Bhavishya Nidhi (EPF) Yojna, 1952 hankam sudharanna korpak vichar korta, zachem parinnam lakhon Bharatiy kamgarancher poddunk xakta. Sutranchea pormonnem, suchoil'leo bodlachem ud'dhest ddanngyak surllit korop ani yojnechi kshamta vaddoup hem asa. Charchak asleli ek mukhel sudharanna mhollear soglle EPFO man'yeata prapt sansthancher KYC niyomanchem pramanikikaran, zaka lagun vangdde zannvayent ek sutrata astali. Sodeak, KYC kagodpatranchea bhedbhavak lagun kaim pavtti da've nikal divpak der zatat. Ho vishay sambandit samitechea nirikshanna khal asa ani 30/06/2024 meren nirnoy eksa divpak yeta.
normalised: Kendriya Kamgar Mantralay Karmachari Bhavishya Nidhi (E-P-F) Yojnent, ek hazar nau she panchvan, sudharanna korpak sodta, jem lakhon Bharatiy kamgarancher puro aksher ghalta. Suchoil'le bodol, sutranchea pormonnem, prakriyank sope korpak ani yojnechi kushaltai vaddoitoleak udesht asa. Charcha kel'lo ek mukhel sudharann mhollear soglle E-P-F-O manyota dinvk zonnaram modem K-Y-C nemanchem pramanikaran korop, jem vangddeak vollokhnnent ekasarkhepenn divp. Sodyak, K-Y-C kagdo-patranchem veglleponn kednaim davyache purai korpak usir laita. Vishay sambodit kameti udexim vicharadin asa ani nirnnay tis Jun don hazar chovis meren zai asta.

unnormalised: Sambhavya sudharannecho anik ek mhotvacho vishay mhollear EPF khateanchem portability. Karmachari nokri bodlota ten'na nidhi ani seva itihasachem sopeponnan hasthanthoronn korpak mantralay marg sodta. Vishesh korun IT ani bandhkam sarkhea udhyogant zaka karmachari ankdeamni vadd zata tankam hem sangtat. Hi prakriya sopi korop karmachareancher ani niyokteancher astolo prashasanik bojh kamikorta. Form 13 joma korop ani praman korpak lagta hi sodyachi paddot aampak ganjalichi dista. Novi vyavastha lagu zali zalear, UMANG appachea madhyomantlean online hasthanthoronn divpak xakta.
normalised: Sambhavit sudharnecho anik ek mahatvacho pekru mhollear E-P-F khateanchem portebiliti (portability). Kamgar nokri bodolttana fund ani seva itihas sopeponnan sthanantor korpak mantralay dhyan dita. Hem khas korun chodd kamgar badli zatat tea kshetramnt relevant asa, jea porim I-T ani bandhkam. Hi prakriya sopi kel'lean kamgar ani malok donuyicher prashasanik ozar kami zatolem. Asleli paddot, Form tera (13) zobdi korun attestation ditlem, tim chodd khattinn lagta mhonn dista. Navem paddot, jari kelear, tem U-M-A-N-G app udexim online sthanantor korpak ditolem.

unnormalised: Suchovnneo naka asli EPF rakhmechi gomdda zaun asa, ji sodeak Rs. 26,000 crore-am voir asa. Hak zaka mellpak zata tannim tanchi rashi mellpachi protsahan divpak mantralay jagruktai mohim suru korteli. Hantunt da'veachi prakriya sopi korop ani EPFO adhar kendrantlean madad divpacho aspav asa. Naka asli rashi niyantrit korpak ani da'vo sadhe korpak ek vishesh portal toiar korpak xakta. EPF Kaydo, 1952 chea kalam 72 pormonnem, sorkarachi jababdari hea nidhinchem rakshonn korpachi asta.
normalised: Heo suchnneo noklem E-P-F rakkmeacho vishay uloitole, jem sodyak rupea don visar so hazar kroracher asa. Mantralay patr vangddeank aple denem magpak uttejit korpak zagrutai muhim suru kortolem. Hantunt davo divpachi prakriya sopi korop ani E-P-F-O madad kendran udexim modot divop somil asa. Noklem rakkmeank traj korpak ani davo divpak ek veglo portal toyar korunk xakta. E-P-F Kaydeaachea section sattar pormonnem, ek hazar nau she panchvan, sorkaracho he fund samballpachi zobabdari asa.

unnormalised: Toxench, mantralay EPF yojnek her samajik suraksha pahilank zoddpak vichar korta, jem Karmachari Rajy Vimo (ESI) yojne sarkhem asta. Hem ekikaran kamgarank ek vhodd samajik suraksha zallem divpak ud'dhest korta, vishesh korun asanghatit kshetrant asloleank. Hem ekikaranachi poriksha korpi ek pilot prakalp 01/01/2025 meren kaim nivddak jil'leant suru zavpachi apeta asa. He bodol man'ye zalear EPF yojnent mhotvachi sudharanna zateli mhonn apeta asa.
normalised: Annik mhonllear, mantralay E-P-F yojnek her samajik suraksha upakramam kodden zoddpak vichar kortat, jea porim Karmachari Rajy Vima (E-S-I) yoje kodden. He ektthai korpak kamgarank ek chodd mottea samajik surakshaachem zallem divpak udeshta, khas korun je asaanghttit kshetramnt asat tanka. He ektthai korpachea vixayant ek pilot proklp poilo January don hazar panchas meren pasand distriktamnt suru zatolem. He bodol, mannya kelear, te E-P-F yojnek mahatvache sudharanne divpak ashevat asa.
